overview: After Gracie comes home early to discover her husband in bed with another woman, her initial anger is replaced by a strange, sensual curiosity. She is left with a renewed determination to find herself sexually, perhaps for the first time. Her journey of discovery finds her trying new experiences girl/girl, three-ways, and domination. In the end, Gracie learns that her deepest desire is to break all ties to the past in order to welcome true passion for her future.
title: Breaking All Ties
